nml_option.name: config_AM_eliassenPalm_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member eliassenPalm is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eliassenPalm_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eliassenPalm_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the eliassenPalm analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eliassenPalm_restart_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the eliassenPalm analysis member will use to performing restarts.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eliassenPalm_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eliassenPalm_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eliassenPalm_debug
nml_option.description: If true, debugging code is turned on.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eliassenPalm_rhomin_buoycoor
nml_option.description: Minimum density used in defining the first buoyancy coordinate layer

nml_option.name: config_AM_eliassenPalm_rhomax_buoycoor
nml_option.description: Maximum density used in defining the last buoyancy coordinate layer

dim.name: nBuoyancyLayers
dim.description: The number of buoyancy layers used for buoyancy coordinates.

dim.name: nBuoyancyLayersP1
dim.description: The number of interfaces between buoyancy layers used for buoyancy coordinates.

package.name: eliassenPalmAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the eliassenPalm analysis member.

var.name: potentialDensityMidRef
var.description: Potential density target values of buoyancy coordinate layers

var.name: potentialDensityTopRef
var.description: Potential density at top of buoyancy coordinate layers

var.name: buoyancyMidRef
var.description: Buoyancy of buoyancy coordinate layers

var.name: buoyancyInterfaceRef
var.description: Buoyancy at interfaces of buoyancy coordinate layers

var.name: buoyancyMaskEA
var.description: ensemble average of the buoyancy mask

var.name: sigmaEA
var.description: Inverse of the derivative of buoyancy wrt z, or thickness per unit buoyancy, aka thickness, in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: nSamplesEA
var.description: Number of samples used in the ensamble average

var.name: heightMidBuoyCoorEA
var.description: z-coordinate of each buoyancy layer, ensemble average

var.name: montgPotGradZonalEA
var.description: Zonal gradient of montgomery potential at cell center in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: montgPotGradMeridEA
var.description: Meridional gradient of montgomery potential at cell center in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: heightMidBuoyCoorSqEA
var.description: z-coordinate of each buoyancy layer, squared, ensemble average

var.name: montgPotBuoyCoorEA
var.description: Montgomery potential in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: heightMGradZonalEA
var.description: Height times zonal gradient of Montgomery potential in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: heightMGradMeridEA
var.description: Height times meridional gradient of Montgomery potential in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: usigmaEA
var.description: Zonal velocity times sigma, ensemble average

var.name: vsigmaEA
var.description: Meridional velocity times sigma, ensemble average

var.name: varpisigmaEA
var.description: Vertical velocity in buoyancy coordinates times sigma, ensemble average

var.name: uusigmaEA
var.description: Zonal velocity times zonal velocity times sigma, ensemble average

var.name: vvsigmaEA
var.description: Meridional velocity times meridional velocity times sigma, ensemble average

var.name: uvsigmaEA
var.description: Zonal velocity times meridional velocity times sigma, ensemble average

var.name: uvarpisigmaEA
var.description: Zonal velocity times vertical velocity in buoyancy coordinates times sigma, ensemble average

var.name: vvarpisigmaEA
var.description: Meridional velocity times vertical velocity in buoyancy coordinates times sigma, ensemble average

var.name: uTWA
var.description: Zonal velocity, thickness weighted

var.name: vTWA
var.description: Meridional velocity, thickness weighted

var.name: varpiTWA
var.description: Vertical velocity, thickness weighted

var.name: duTWAdz
var.description: Derivative of thickness weighted zonal velocity with respect to z (vertical coordinate).

var.name: dvTWAdz
var.description: Derivative of thickness weighted meridional velocity with respect to z (vertical coordinate).

var.name: EPFT
var.description: Eliassen-Palm flux tensor

var.name: uuTWACorr
var.description: Thickness-weighted averaged eddy u-u correlation.

var.name: vvTWACorr
var.description: Thickness-weighted averaged eddy v-v correlation.

var.name: uvTWACorr
var.description: Thickness-weighted averaged eddy u-v correlation.

var.name: epeTWA
var.description: Thickness-weighted averaged eddy potential energy.

var.name: eddyFormDragZonal
var.description: Thickness-weighted averaged eddy form drag in x

var.name: eddyFormDragMerid
var.description: Thickness-weighted averaged eddy form drag in y

var.name: divEPFT
var.description: Divergence of the Eliassen-Palm flux tensor, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: divEPFT1
var.description: First component of the divergence of the Eliassen-Palm flux tensor, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: divEPFT2
var.description: Second component of the divergence of the Eliassen-Palm flux tensor, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: divEPFTshear1
var.description: First component of divergence of shear components of the Eliassen-Palm flux tensor, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: divEPFTshear2
var.description: Second component of divergence of shear components of the Eliassen-Palm flux tensor, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: divEPFTdrag1
var.description: First component of divergence of form drag components of the Eliassen-Palm flux tensor, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: divEPFTdrag2
var.description: Second component of divergence of form drag components of the Eliassen-Palm flux tensor, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: ErtelPVFlux
var.description: Ertel potential vorticity flux in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: ErtelPVFlux1
var.description: First component of the Ertel potential vorticity flux in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: ErtelPVFlux2
var.description: Second component of the Ertel potential vorticity flux in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: ErtelPVTendency
var.description: Tendency of Ertel PV due to divergence of eddy PV fluxes

var.name: ErtelPV
var.description: Ertel PV on buoyancy surfaces

var.name: ErtelPVGradZonal
var.description: Ertel PV on buoyancy surfaces

var.name: ErtelPVGradMerid
var.description: Ertel PV on buoyancy surfaces

var.name: firstLayerBuoyCoor
var.description: index, in buoyancy coordinates, of the first layer in column for a given cell

var.name: lastLayerBuoyCoor
var.description: index, in buoyancy coordinates, of the last layer in column for a given cell

var.name: heightMidBuoyCoor
var.description: Height (z-coordinate) of buoyancy layer

var.name: heightTopBuoyCoor
var.description: Height (z-coordinate) at top of buoyancy layer

var.name: heightInterfaceBuoyCoor
var.description: Height (z-coordinate) of the interfaces of buoyancy layer

var.name: sigma
var.description: Inverse of the derivative of buoyancy wrt z, aka thickness, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: montgPotBuoyCoor
var.description: Montgomery potential in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: montgPotNormalGradOnEdge
var.description: Normal gradient of the montgomery potential in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: uMidBuoyCoor
var.description: Longitudinal velocity at middle of layers in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: vMidBuoyCoor
var.description: Meridional velocity at the middle of layers in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: densityMidBuoyCoor
var.description: In-situ density at middle of layers in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: densityTopBuoyCoor
var.description: In-situ density at top of layers in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: buoyancyMask
var.description: mask in buoyancy coordinates, ocean cells are 1

var.name: montgPotGradX
var.description: x component of gradient of montgomery potential at cell center in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: montgPotGradY
var.description: y component of gradient of montgomery potential at cell center in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: montgPotGradZ
var.description: z component of gradient of montgomery potential at cell center in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: montgPotGradZonal
var.description: Zonal component of gradient of montgomery potential at cell center in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: montgPotGradMerid
var.description: Meridional component of gradient of montgomery potential at cell center in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: wrk3DnVertLevelsP1
var.description: work array

var.name: wrk3DnVertLevels
var.description: work array

var.name: wrk3DBuoyCoor
var.description: work array

var.name: ErtelPVNormalGradOnEdge
var.description: Normal gradient of EPV in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: ErtelPVGradX
var.description: X component of gradient of EPV in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: ErtelPVGradY
var.description: Y component of gradient of EPV in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: ErtelPVGradZ
var.description: Z component of gradient of EPV in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: wrkVector
var.description: Work vector array

var.name: wrkTensor
var.description: Work tensor array

var.name: array1_3D
var.description: test array 1, in depth coordinates

var.name: array2_3D
var.description: test array 2, in depth coordinates

var.name: array3_3D
var.description: test array 3, in depth coordinates

var.name: array1_3Dbuoy
var.description: test array 1, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: array2_3Dbuoy
var.description: test array 2, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: PVMidBuoyCoor
var.description: Potential vorticity at cell center, in buoyancy coordinates

var.name: PVMidBuoyCoorEA
var.description: Potential vorticity at cell center, in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: uMidBuoyCoorEA
var.description: Zonal velocity at cell center, in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: vMidBuoyCoorEA
var.description: Meridional velocity at cell center, in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: uPVMidBuoyCoorEA
var.description: Zonal velocity times Potential vorticity at cell center, in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: vPVMidBuoyCoorEA
var.description: Meridional velocity times Potential vorticity at cell center, in buoyancy coordinates, ensemble average

var.name: PVFluxTest
var.description: Potential vorticity flux test vector, in buoyancy coordinates
